Articles.Content: The Cylon Raider packs two Guided Missiles, and also lift engines for graceful takeoffs not for hovering, range is short and handling is not too good but still fun to fly, takeoff with full throttle, RCS & SAS and the craft will lift at about 55 m/s. [Cylon Raider](https://files.secureserver.net/0sziOds61c3bC0) ![p>
